front.title: FQDNs resolution when the MAC and DNS cache are empty

abstract.t: This document specifies the procedures for resolving Fully Qualified Domain Names (FQDNs) in IPv6 and IPv4 networks when both the Media Access Control (MAC) and the Domain Name System (DNS) cache are empty. The procedures aim to reduce the latency and improve the efficiency of FQDN resolution in such scenarios. The procedures described in this document are relevant for both IPv6 and IPv4 networks, and they can be implemented in hosts and routers.
